name: Spelling Bee Finals
description: Congratulations to our finalists for earning a spot in the next round! Come out and cheer them on.

name: Author Assembly: Shawn Harris
description: The PTA is hosting author Shawn Harris for an assembly for our students on the release of his new book Let's Be Bees.

name: Bubblefest
description: Bubblefest takes place in the cafeteria. Volunteers are still needed for setup and cleanup.

name: Four Seasons Fundraising Concert
description: The Castillero Middle School Orchestras will perform a high-quality program of classical and contemporary music, featuring guest performer Mads Tolling.

name: Galentine's Night Out
description: 45 minutes of strength training workout followed by bubbles at F45 Branham Park. This is a free event with a maximum of 30 people.

name: Yearbook Cover Contest
description: Los Alamitos PTA is inviting all Los Alamitos 5th graders to enter their drawings in the Yearbook cover contest. 2 winners will be selected.

description: Deadline to submit audition videos for the Variety Show.

name: Math Kangaroo Competition
description: Math Kangaroo competition for students. Registration code: CASAN_J0017001@2026math

name: Reading Lab Volunteer
description: The Reading Lab is a tutoring program for students who would benefit from extra help with fundamental reading skills. Volunteers are needed once per week on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, or Thursdays.

name: Yearbook Orders
description: Last day to order the 2025-26 yearbook. 5th grade parents should submit baby photos by March 1st.

name: Middle School Selection Process
description: Deadline for 5th grade families to submit school choice requests online through the Parent Portal.
